about_the_game:
A splendid package of 5 Music Tracks to create your meditative atmosphere.

Track list:
Meditation - Alchemorph
Lyssna - This Patch of Sky
Blinded - Jordan Hatfield
Tower of the Winds - REW <<
In the Clouds - Be Still the Earth
detailed_description:
A splendid package of 5 Music Tracks to create your meditative atmosphere.

Track list:
Meditation - Alchemorph

name: YOGA MASTER - Meditation Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A splendid package of 5 Music Tracks to create your meditative atmosphere.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
